Room.Name: Rose Garden
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path through the rose garden in the Hanging Gardens.
Room.LongDescription: There is a gardner stationed here to prevent anyone from picking the beautiful blooms, as these are the roses used by the council in the Kista Towers when they wish to discuss something in secret. One of these roses is suspended over the meeting table, placing the members under the rose, or "sub rosa." The second level is northwest.
